b2.lore:
Cocoa Beans Minion XII
&7Place this minion and it will start
&7generating and harvesting cocoa
&7beans. Requires jungle logs nearby
&7so cocoa can be placed, or air
&7nearby so jungle logs can be
&7placed. Minions also work when you
&7are offline!

&7Time Between Actions: &a12s
&7Max Storage: &e960
&7Resources Generated: &b0

&9&lRARE&r

&7Cost
&9Cocoa Beans Minion XI
&9Enchanted Cookie &8x16
&575 Pelts

f5.name: Sell Item
f5.lore:
&7Click items in your inventory to
&7sell them to this Shop!

f6.name: pelts
f6.lore:
&dPelts: &50
&7Pelts are earned from &ehunting
&7special animals on this
&7island. Talk to &aTrevor &7to
&7receive &dtasks &7to find and
&7kill these animals.
